item.title: What is Soliloquy?
item.description: Soliloquy is an act of speaking one’s thoughts aloud when by oneself or regardless of any hearers, especially by a character in a play. I’ve created a mobile application that helps learning foreign languages by speaking. If you would like to try beta version of the application join waiting list!
